name: Apogee Enterprises, Inc.
description: Apogee Enterprises, Inc. is a leading provider of architectural glass, serving the commercial construction and renovation sectors. Founded in 1949, Apogee has evolved into a diversified company specializing in glass fabrication, installation, and services through its various subsidiaries. The company operates in four primary segments: Architectural Glass, Architectural Services, Large-Scale Optical Technologies, and Picture Framing. Apogee’s Architectural Glass segment is known for its innovative and energy-efficient glass products, which include high-performance insulating glass units and specialty glass solutions. The Architectural Services division focuses on the installation of glass and framing systems, providing comprehensive project management from design to completion. The Large-Scale Optical Technologies segment manufactures advanced products for the optical and imaging industries, while the Picture Framing segment provides custom framing solutions. Apogee is committed to sustainability and environmental responsibility, developing products that enhance energy efficiency and reduce the carbon footprint of buildings. With a strong focus on quality and customer satisfaction, Apogee has built a reputation for excellence in the architectural industry, serving clients across North America and internationally.
